title: How to Make Matcha Fruit Syrup

steps.headline: Mix the sugar and matcha in a saucepan.
Add the water and bring to the boil while stirring constantly.
Reduce to a simmer and leave to reduce over 15 minutes.
steps.description: Stir occasionally and keep checking it is cooking well.

steps.headline: Strain to remove clumps of matcha powder.
Add the chopped fruit to the strained syrup and mix completely.
Serve.
steps.description: Leave to cool. Once cooled, pour over ice cream etc. as wished.

text: Mix the sugar and matcha in a saucepan.  Add the water and bring to the boil while stirring constantly. Don't let it boil over. Reduce to a simmer and leave to reduce over 15 minutes. Stir occasionally and keep checking it is cooking well. Let it cool a little.  Strain to remove clumps of matcha powder.  Add the chopped fruit to the strained syrup and mix completely.  Serve. Leave to cool. Once cooled, pour over ice cream etc. as wished. Finished.
